calculation_measure_difficulty: It's calculated on the basis of the number of applicants who have correctly answered, divided by total number of applicants它是根据答题人正确回答计数除以答题人计数总数.

create_a_new_entry: Create a new question创建一个新问题
creator: Authors作者
delete_items: {1} 删除问题 |[2,Inf[ 删除 %count% 个问题
display_all_list: Display the whole list显示单词列表
display_all_on_this_page: Display all on this page在此页全部显示
docimology_difficulty_index_help_part_1: The difficulty index is equivalent to the question success percentage难度指数相当于问题成功率.
docimology_difficulty_index_help_part_2: It is calculated with the number of candidates who answered correctly divided by the total number of respondents它是根据回答正确的候选人总数除以被调查者的总数来计算的.
docimology_difficulty_index_help_part_3: If the index is high, it is that the question is easy. Conversely, if an index is low, the question is difficult如果指数很高，问题就很容易解决。相反，如果指数很低，这个问题就很难.
docimology_difficulty_index_help_part_4: This index does not take into account students who did not see the question这个指数没有考虑到那些没有看到问题的学生 .
docimology_discrimination_coefficient_he: The coefficient of discrimination of a question is a coefficient of correlation between the results obtained with the question and those obtained with the whole test一个问题的甄别系数是与该问题的结果和整个测试所得的系数之间的相关系数.

A positive value highlights a question that supports the best, while a negative value means that the learners with the worst scores have responded the most一个积极的价值观强调支持最好的学生，而消极的价值观意味着学习成绩最差的学生做出的回答最多.
When a question has a negative CD, it means that it penalizes the best. It is therefore best to avoid such questions当一个问题有一个负的CD，这意味着它在惩罚最好的。因此，最好避免这样的问题.
It should be noted that if all students get the same score on a question, the coefficient will not be defined应该注意的是，如果所有学生在一个问题上得到相同的分数，这个系数就不会被定义.
docimology_note_gauges_help: Because of the possibility of modifying the exercises while copies have already been made, the notes are calculated and then reported on 100 由于修改的可能的性，当副本已经被评分时，修改被计算和报告是100%的.

docimology_papers_partially_successfull: Number of partially successfull papers一部分成功的试卷数
docimology_papers_missed: Number of missed papers试卷不合格数

edit_question: Edit a question编辑一个问题
editor_invalid_no_save_desc: This quiz cannot be saved due to missing or invalid data. Please solve these problems before saving.这个测验因无效数据不能被保存，请解决问题后保存
editor_not_validating_desc: Work in progress: some information is missing or requires changes.在进行中：一些信息丢失或需要改变
editor_penalty_label: Penalty for every non defined wrong answer.
editor_validating_desc: Some errors or missing information prevent saving data一些错误或丢失的信息妨碍保存数据.
error_no_step_found: An error occured while retrieving the current step当检索当前步骤时发生错误.
exercise_alert_break: The interruption of this quiz is not allowed. Your paper will be considered finished测试中断是允许的，您的试卷将被认库已完成 !
exercise_finished_attempts: [0, 1] 您已经完成 %count% 尝试|]1,Inf[ 您已完成 %count% 尝试
exercise_tries: [0, 1] 您已测试 %count% 次|]1,Inf[ 您已测试 %count% 次
exo_empty_user_can_edit: This quiz is empty. Please edit and publish it to fill it测试为空，请编辑并且发布.
exo_empty_user_read_only: This quiz is empty and has not been configured by its designer. Please come back later测试库空并且还没有被它的设计者保存，请稍后回来.
explain_coeff_dis0: The copies must have the same questions to calculate the discriminatory coefficient副本必须有相同的问题来计算判别系数.
explain_coeff_dis1: 分析问题的相关性，这个相关系数从-1到1不等.
explain_coeff_dis2: The questions with a discriminatory coefficient between 0.35 and 0.65 maximize the discrimination of students差别系数在0.35到0.65之间的学生最大限度地判别.
explain_coeff_dis3: Questions which have a negative index point a discrepancy: the best students fail these questions, the lowest pass these questions有负指数的问题不合格：最好的学生在此问题上失败，最差的学生则的通过这些问题.
explain_measure_difficulty: The measure of difficulty is equal to the percentage of success to the question难度的度量等于问题成功率的百分比.
export_qti_exercise: 用 QTI 格式导出测验问题

set_set_empty_data_error: Set data can not be empty设置的数据不能为空.
share_admin_rights: Share edit and delete rights共享编辑和删除权限
share_items: {1} 共享问题 |[2,Inf[ 共享 %count% 个问题
should_be_greater_or_equal_to_zero: This value should be greater than or equal to 0值不能大于或等于0.
show_additional_info: Display additional information显示附加信息
show_end_page: Display quiz end page显示测验结束页
show_feedback: Show feedbacks after each step在每个步骤后显示反馈
show_interact_fields: Hints and global feedback提示和全部反馈
show_metadata_fields: Title and other fields标题和其他字段
show_overview: Display quiz information page显示测验信息
solution_score: {-1, 0, 1} %score% 分数 |[2,+Inf[ %score% 分数 |]-Inf, -2] %score% 分数
solution_score_not_valid: A score must be a valid number分数必须为有效数字.
step_item_add: 拖拉或点击 "+" 按钮增加问题.
step_need_manual_correction: This step needs manual correction此步骤需手工批改
submit_a_list: Submit a list提交一个列表
sum_score_choice_at_least_one_correct_an: At least one answer must have a positive score至少有一个答案必须有正数分数.
sum_score_choice_no_correct_answer_error: The correct answer must have a positive score正确答案必须有正数分数.
title: Title标题
unsaved_changes_warning: Some changes to the quiz have not been saved. If you leave this page now, they will be lost对测验的改动没有被保存。如果你现在离开这页，它们就会丢失.
user_shared: Name of user to share the question with用户共享问题名称
warning: Are you sure you want to delete this picture确定要删除这个图片吗 ?
warning_change_type_q: Warning: You may lose the data you've entered. Continue警告：你可能会丢失您输入的数据。继续吗?
warning_one_word: You have chosen a question word. Caution: You need spaces in your answer你选择了一个疑问词。注意：你的答案需要空格.
watch_at_the_original_size: Watch at the original size用原始大小观看
weight_choice: Assign points by answer根据答案分配数
words_case_sensitive: The answer must respect the keyword case to be valid符合关键词大小写的答案是有效的
words_count_answers_error: ]0, 1] 至少有一个关键词.|]1,Inf[ 至少 %count% 个关键词是必须的.
words_duplicate_answers: Keywords can not be duplicated关键词不能被重复
words_empty_text_error: A keyword can not be empty关键词不能为空.
words_feedback_info: Feedback if the keyword is in answer关键词在答案中的反馈
words_no_valid_solution: 至少有一个关键词分数大于 0.
words_score_not_valid: The score of a keyword can not be empty关键词分数不能为空.
words_show_case_sensitive_option: 允许 "大小写检查" 功能.
wrong_name: The input name is wrong输入错误的名称
wrong_point: The input value is wrong输入错误的值
add_color: Add a color增加一个颜色
possible_color_choices: Possible text colors可能的文本颜色:
global_penalty: Penalty for each undefined answer每次不正确答案的惩罚
create_selection_zone: Create a selection zone创建一个选择区
selection_text_must_have_valid_answers_e: Selections must have at least one valid answer必须选择一个有效答案
selection_empty_text_error: Please fill the text请填写文凭
selection_text_must_contain_selections_e: The text must have at least one selection至少选择一个文本
selection_must_have_valid_answers_errors: You need at least one valid answer至少有一个有效答案
selection_answers_must_use_different_col: Colors must be different颜色必须不同
selection_colors_must_be_differents: You can't use identical colors您不能使用相同的颜色
selection_solution_missing_colors_error: Selections must have at least one color至少选择一个颜色
no_try_left: No try left没有剩余尝试
selection_missing_click: Penalty for each wrong click每个错误点击的惩罚
quiz_numbering: Numbering of steps and questions步骤和问题编号
number_max_attempts_per_day_help: 输入 0 表示不限制尝试词数
must_be_less_than_max_attempts: Must be less than the maximum amount of attempts一定小于最大数量的尝试
must_be_more_than_max_attempts: Must be more or equals than the maximum amount of attempts一定有大于或等于最大数量的尝试
mandatory_questions: Mandatory answers to questions对问题的强制性回答
duplicate_item: Duplicate an item重复一个项目
number_question_page: Number of question per page每页问题数
tag-amount: Number of question related to the tag that must be picked 被选择标签的相关问题数量
